title: Tensor-LNN
description: GPU scaling of Propositional LNN
url: https://github.com/IBM/TensorLNN
tag: "LNN"

weight: 2

## Description

GPU scaling of Propositional LNN for Word Sense Disambiguation and Text Word Common Sense - implementation using sparse-tensors with bounds, downward and an AND/NOT representation

## Main Contributors

Anamitra Roy Choudhury, Venkatesan Chakaravarthy, Ananda Pal, Yogish Sabharwal
